author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Caredx Inc Enters Into A License And Commercialization Agreement With Illumina
text:
May 8 (Reuters) - CareDx Inc:
* CAREDX INC - ON MAY 4, 2018, CO ENTERED INTO A LICENSE AND COMMERCIALIZATION AGREEMENT WITH ILLUMINA, INC - SEC FILING
* CAREDX-AGREEMENT PROVIDES CO WITH WORLDWIDE DISTRIBUTION, DEVELOPMENT, COMMERCIALIZATION RIGHTS TO ILLUMINA’S TRANSPLANT CLINICAL APPLICATION PRODUCTS
* CAREDX-BEGINNING ON JUNE 1, CO WILL BE EXCLUSIVE WORLDWIDE DISTRIBUTOR OF ILLUMINA’S TRUSIGHT HLA V1 AND V2 PRODUCT LINES, ASSOCIATED ASSIGN HLA SOFTWARE
* CAREDX INC - UNDER TERMS OF LICENSE AGREEMENT, COMPANY MADE A $5.0 MILLION INITIAL PAYMENT TO ILLUMINA
* CAREDX - UNDER TERMS OF LICENSE AGREEMENT, COMPANY WILL PAY ROYALTIES IN MID-SINGLE TO LOW-DOUBLE DIGITS ON SALES OF FUTURE COMMERCIALIZED PRODUCTS Source text: ( bit.ly/2KLcJmR ) Further company coverage:
